abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission said a former executive at Coca-Cola Enterprises acted on nonpublic information about a pending deal with the Coca-Cola Company.
snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission said a former executive at Coca-Cola Enterprises acted on nonpublic information about a pending deal with the Coca-Cola Company.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission charged a former executive at a Coca-Cola bottling company with insider trading on Thursday, saying he acted on nonpublic information about a pending deal with the Coca-Cola Company.

headline.main: Former Coca-Cola Bottling Executive Charged With Insider Trading
